text: ah yes, the weekly ritual of clearing the half gigabyte of crap that slack has cached in my browser for reasons only its designers understand

text: I assume the cookies are small, it's the cache.  It has 1/2 GB of cache... the site with the next biggest cache is webex for work and that only stores 60 MB, everything else stores basically nothing
